originalText.text:
10 Star Funeral Home Services.  Family, extended family and close friends and myself have experienced their extremely, compassionate, knowledgeable,  diligent, efficiency  and empathetic individual customer centered services from their first year at this location and it remains the same.  The quality of their overall services remain top shelf irregardless
of how much you spend. There is no pressure to entice you to exceed your budget and at all price points satisfaction has been
equal.  The entire staff treats you with dignity, respect and patience.

originalText.text: Mr. Rich,  Ms Jocelyn, and all of the George Weldon family has become my family. When my father passed in March of 2022, they took care of him and my family as if he was their own. My family found comfort in their staff and services. Now my aunt passed away and brought my family to them and yet once again they did everything right! The services was perfection. My family found comfort in their services. Their attention to detail was amazing yet once again. I want to thank you for all you have done. You went over and beyond and my family appreciates you dearly. For all reading this, you want you're loved one to be taken care of properly George Weldon Funeral Home is the place for them. I bet my life that you will not regret it! God bless Mr. Weldon and family! Xoxo

originalText.text: They did a great job, they had let my son do his aunt's makeup and I did my sister's hair.... wonderful people. Thank you so much God Bless.

text.text: They did a great job, they had let my son do his aunt's makeup and I did my sister's hair.... wonderful people. Thank you so much God Bless.

originalText.text: I love everything about Mrs. Wanda and all the staff at George H. Weldon. Let me start by saying that I went to two other funeral homes before I went for my meeting with Mrs. Wanda. I wanted nothing but the best for my mom, and she received just that. I left the meeting feeling confident that my mom was in great hands, my sisters and I were treated with compassion, caring, sympathy and understanding. They were professional, efficient and what I love the most is that they communicate with me every step of the way. On the day of the service, my mom looked so beautiful and her makeup looked just like how she will wear it if she was alive. I want to thank everyone at George H. Weldon, my mom looks gorgeous and angelic. I'm very satisfied with the service, staff and everything was amazing. I would recommend your Funeral to anyone that's looking for a great place to hold a service for their loved ones.

originalText.text:
Director Wanda Frost was lovely.  Wanda listened and met our requests from the beginning I knew I was in the right place. Her attention to my concerns put me at ease . My mom looked  natural as she laid In her coffin. They captured her essence I was really pleased with the outcome and the service provided .  I will definitely recommend George Weldon’s Funeral to everyone in my circle.  My brother Gilberto was very happy we chose your services.
Best of luck and know our family will stay with Weldon! Thank you all for making this a beautiful memory.
